appetizers.name: Fried Pickles
appetizers.description: Our famous beer battered, deep fried pickles that will make you question 'what came first, the pickle or the cucumber?'

appetizers.name: Sproutin Onion
appetizers.description: You've heard of the 'Blooming Onion' and the 'Cactus Blossom' now we present the 'Sproutin Onion'. It's the same thing... just better

cold sandwhiches.name: Classic Club
cold sandwhiches.ingredients: White bread, mayo, mustard, lettuce put some turkey, ham, and bacon on there too!
cold sandwhiches.description: What more do we need to say? It's your classic club sandwhich with all the essentials

cold sandwhiches.name: Turkey BL - T
cold sandwhiches.description: We think this is how the BLT was supposed to be. Lot's of bacon and lettuce with some turkey and take off that tomato.

hot sandwiches.name: Steak and Everything
ingredients: (peppers, onions, mushrooms and cheese... lots of cheese)
hot sandwiches.description: This is everything you could as for and more! (the extra cheese is the 'more' of that statment)

hot sandwiches.name: Meatball Marinara
hot sandwiches.ingredients: 12' sub, seasoned italian meetballs, special red sauce (it's really just good marinara sauce)
hot sandwiches.description: This will take you back to your days in Italy, even if you've never been there.

desserts.name: Italian Ice
desserts.description: It's like icecream, but better. Ask any Italian

desserts.name: Cheesecake Bites
desserts.description: We took cheescake, wrapped it up in goodness, and freid it. Your welcome!

drinks.name: Lemonade
drinks.description: Freshly squeezed everyday. Real pulp and lemon juice is a given.

drinks.name: Coke
drinks.description: Would we really be a restaraunt without it?
